item.title: Hole appeared in road, 23rd July
item.description:
A hole has opened up in the road and it appears that a very large void is underneath (possibly sewer?). This could collapse at any time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Elcot Avenue, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Does lime bike own the park?, 23rd July
item.description:
If not then why are they allowed to have all their bikes littered all over the place? I can only upload 3 pictures at once but I saw from JUST today's hour walk, 5 lime bikes on the ground. When I looked at reports for Beckenham place park a large portion of them all about lime bikes from all different users.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravensbourne Greenway, Southend, London
Report on FixMyStreet
